mapper.select: select * from (select c.id, c.title, c.classinfo, t.profile_img from course c left outer join teacher t on c.teacher_id = t.id order by c.id desc) where rownum <= 8

select c.id as course_id, c.title, c.status, to_char(c.start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_date, to_char(c.end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_date, c.location, c.studyday, c.studytime, t.id as teacher_id, t.name, t.profile_img from course c, teacher t where c.teacher_id = t.id and c.id in (select course_id from matching where student_id = #{studentId}) and c.status ='matching'
